channel.title: How to make your own server!
channel.description:
PLEASE NOTE PICTURES DIDNT POP UP, YOU HAVE TO CLICK THE LINK FOR THE PICTURE.
HOW TO MAKE A SERVER: Step 1: Search up Command Prompt http://i39.tinypic.com/20auplw.jpg
Step 2: Open Command Prompt and type in ’ipconfig’ no ’s http://i39.tinypic.com/15d2mna.jpg
Step 3: Enter your default gateway into your address bar http://i44.tinypic.com/2558e2a.jpg http://i43.tinypic.com/18i3w0.jpg
Step 4: Log in - Page should load like this: http://i43.tinypic.com/2n6u8e9.jpg
Step 5: Click Advanced http://i40.tinypic.com/2qvyzpw.jpg
Step 6: Enter the following: http://i39.tinypic.com/15d2mna.jpg
http://i44.tinypic.com/mcur0o.jpg
Step 7: Save http://i42.tinypic.com/anj67q.jpg
Step 8: Go to No-Ip.com and Register: http://i39.tinypic.com/2l29i0.jpg
http://i44.tinypic.com/1zf1kcl.jpg
Step 9: Click Add A Host http://i43.tinypic.com/10mvo91.jpg
Step 10: Create YOUR SERVER IP! http://i39.tinypic.com/mt1nrk.jpg
Step 11: Download THIS: https://www.no-ip.com/downloads.php
Step 12: Open No-Ip Duc And... http://i43.tinypic.com/idgb35.jpg> THEN HIT X ON NO-IP DUC AND IT WILL MINIMIZE. DO NOT EXIT NO-IP DUC!
Step 13: Find YOUR SOURCE :) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html
Step 14: Open Source and hit RUN! THEN CONNECT! *Please note if not using Ip Changer MUST open Gui in Client and change ip eather *127.0.0.1 *Others Replace with YOUR IP!
Compile!
FINISHING: Congratulations, you now have your own server. PLEASE REP ME!
★♥♫×º ★♥♫×º ★♥♫×º ★♥♫×º ★♥♫×º ★♥♫×º ★♥♫×º ★♥♫×º ★♥♫×º ★♥♫×º ★♥♫×º ★♥♫×º ★♥♫×º ★♥♫×º ★♥♫×º ★♥♫×º ★♥♫×º

item.title: How to make your own server!
item.dc:creator: @Justin76 Justin76
item.description:
@Justin76 wrote:

PLEASE NOTE PICTURES DIDNT POP UP, YOU HAVE TO CLICK THE LINK FOR THE PICTURE.

HOW TO MAKE A SERVER:
Step 1:
Search up Command Prompt

Step 2:
Open Command Prompt and type in ’ipconfig’ no ’s

Step 3:
Enter your default gateway into your address bar

Step 4:
Log in - Page should load like this:

Step 5:
Click Advanced

Step 6:
Enter the following:

Step 7:
Save

Step 8:
Go to No-Ip.com and Register:
http://i39.tinypic.com/2l29i0.jpg

Step 9:
Click Add A Host

Step 10:
Create YOUR SERVER IP!

Step 11:
Download THIS:
https://www.no-ip.com/downloads.php

Step 12: Open No-Ip Duc And…
http://i43.tinypic.com/idgb35.jpg>
THEN HIT X ON NO-IP DUC AND IT WILL MINIMIZE. DO NOT EXIT NO-IP DUC!

Step 13:
Find YOUR SOURCE

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Step 14:
Open Source and hit RUN! THEN CONNECT!
*Please note if not using Ip Changer MUST open Gui in Client and change ip eather
*127.0.0.1
*Others
Replace with YOUR IP!

Compile!

FINISHING:
Congratulations, you now have your own server.
PLEASE REP ME!
